CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, October 10, 1953, pg. 21 reads: "Home-Owners Now - A reasonable down payment and a long term in which to complete payments was one of the attractions which induced these people to participate in Belmar Gardens Co-operative."
TitMainTitle: Crowd of men, women, and children, including girl wearing light colored short sleeve shirt and dark jumper with light colored stripe on bottom of skirt, gathered on site of Belmar Gardens for groundbreaking, with light colored tent, American flag, and trees
